title: The Quick Touch Microwave by Breville - Thought for Food with Heston Blumenthal
description: Heston Blumenthal demonstrates how the Quick Touch is the first microwave that works properly on an array of different foods and is also easy and simple to use.

asset.author: Breville Food Thinkers
asset.description:
Heston Blumenthal demonstrates how the Quick Touch is the first microwave that works properly on an array of different foods and is also easy and simple to use.
Find the Quick Touch Microwave here: http://www.breville.com.au/cooking-appliances/microwave-ovens.html
Find recipes and more videos here: http://www.foodthinkers.com.au/
